name: @beardcoder/simple-components
description: A minimal and interactive UI component API with vanilla JS.

scripts.build: bun exec tsup src/index.ts --dts --format esm,cjs --minify --outDir dist
scripts.dev: bun exec tsup src/index.ts --dts --format esm,cjs --watch --outDir dist
scripts.release: bun run format && bun run test && bun run build && standard-version
scripts.release:patch: bun run format && bun run test && bun run build && standard-version --release-as patch
scripts.release:minor: bun run format && bun run test && bun run build && standard-version --release-as minor
scripts.release:major: bun run format && bun run test && bun run build && standard-version --release-as major
scripts.release:prerelease: bun run format && bun run test && bun run build && standard-version --prerelease rc
scripts.release:publish: git push --follow-tags origin HEAD && bun publish --access public
